nodes.text: The Cave was a cantina situated in the floating city of Tolea Biqua on the planet Genarius, which offered patrons the opportunity to experience what life was like for a mynock. The cantina was located beneath Tolea Biqua and by utilizing both the city's rotation and artificial gravity generators, the patrons of the cantina were able to walk on the establishment's ceiling. Circa 31 BBY, the bounty hunter Melo Centris and some of her Devaronian associates visited The Cave.
